title: Client shows randomly
body: When I'm on a different tab, the client shows up randomly.

replies.body: Hey, I'm not totally sure what you mean here.  Do you mean that it pops up as your main focus even though you were doing something else?

Gotcha!  Unless you're getting DM's it shouldn't just be popping up randomly like that.  This can happen if you have third party programs running trying to give it priority.  Apps like Nvidia I believe can do this.  Your best bet may be to run a [Clean Boot,](https://support.gaijin.net/hc/en-us/articles/200070041-How-To-Perform-a-Clean-Boot-PC-MAC-) and slowly start launching your programs until it stops happening again.  That will help rule out which one is causing it.
